sentence.Network_en: Traffic was streaming down the grade, mostly big trucks in the righthand lane.
sentence.Network_cn: 下坡的路上车流如潮, 大卡车大都行驶在右车道上.

sentence.Network_en: Please seal the envelope and stick the stamps on the upper righthand corner.
sentence.Network_cn: 请把信封口,把邮票贴在右上角.

sentence.Network_en: He began to search in the righthand pocket of his well - worn and baggy linen suit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开始在那件磨得很旧的,鼓鼓的衣服上的右边口袋里东摸西摸.

RelatedPhrase.word: The little girl in the righthand attic

list.key: The little girl in the righthand attic
list.abs: ...莎拉同意，由天窗进入莎拉房间抓猴子。他同时也注意到莎拉的居住环境，并且回报卡里斯福德先生。从此以后，兰达斯都会讲一些「右边阁楼少女（The little girl in the righthand attic）」的事情给卡里斯福德先生听。

entry.def: If something is on the right-hand side of something, it is positioned on the right of it.

example.ex: ...a church on the right-hand side of the road.
...the upper right-hand corner of the picture.

auth_sentence.content: "It is remarkable," says Katerina, the Prof's righthand doctor, who is standing in for him while he is on holiday.
